name: Elon Musk Simulator 2
description:
Elon Musk decided to make his biggest dream as real. Now, we're on 2056 and Elon Musk is at Mars to create a colony at there. If can he do that, the all world will be saved. People will stop carrying the status of world. In this game, you'll be Elon Musk as player. You need to think like Elon Musk and create your colony at there. Then you'll able to bring people from World to Mars.


First start with looting irons, gold and diamonds. Then start building your colony. A colony needs water and electric. So you need to use solar electric powers to generate electric. Also you need to use water engines to bring water from in-side of Mars.



  • Level One Colony House: Needs low electric and water. It can handle only one person.
  • Level Two Colony House: Needs medium electric and water. It can handle three people.
  • Level Three Colony House: Needs high electric and water. It can handle five people.

  • Discovery Car: It has been made for low gravity of Mars. You can explain mars with that and loot materials from caves as faster.

  • Flyable Discovery Ship: It can fly and make you play the game faster.

  • R.C Item Looter: With this vehicle, you can loot materials without having oxygen problem.

  • Solar Electric Panel for electric generation and a water engine for water needs.

  • Use your engineer abilites to make water pipe and electric cable connects.

  • Use Colony Defender to defense your colony from aliens. Else, they can destroy your all colony in just a night.

  • Use Lazer Item Looter gun to loot materials.

  • Use destroyer gun to destroy what you've builded.
